org.apache.flink.runtime.resourcemanager

类 ResourceManagerRunner

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.resourcemanager.ResourceManagerRunner
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    FatalErrorHandler

    public class ResourceManagerRunner
extends java.lang.Object
implements FatalErrorHandler
    Simple StandaloneResourceManager runner. It instantiates the resource manager's services and handles fatal errors by shutting the resource manager down.

    • 字段概要

      • onFatalError

        public void onFatalError(java.lang.Throwable exception)
        从接口复制的说明: FatalErrorHandler
        Being called when a fatal error occurs.

        IMPORTANT: This call should never be blocking since it might be called from within the main thread of an RpcEndpoint.

        指定者:
        onFatalError 在接口中 FatalErrorHandler
        参数:
        exception - cause
